profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

friends.description: An array of user IDs that are friends with this user.

FriendRequest.title: Friend Request
FriendRequest.description: Represents a friend request between two users.

from.description: The user ID of the person sending the request.

to.description: The user ID of the person receiving the request.

status.description: The current status of the friend request.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

senderId.description: The user ID of the message sender.

text.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The time the message was sent.

participants.description: An array of user IDs participating in the chat.

userId.description: The ID of the user who posted the status.

text.description: The content of the status update.

timestamp.description: The time the status was posted.

Call.title: Call
Call.description: Represents a call between users, containing signaling information.

participants.description: An array of user IDs participating in the call.

offer.description: The WebRTC session description offer from the caller.

answer.description: The WebRTC session description answer from the callee.

WebRTCCandidate.title: WebRTC Candidate
WebRTCCandidate.description: Represents a WebRTC ICE candidate for establishing a connection.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user, ensuring a unique username.

/friendRequests/{requestId}.description: Stores all friend requests sent between users.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores chat conversations and their participant information.

/chats/{chatI d}/messages/{messageId}.description: A subcollection for messages within a specific chat.

/calls/{callId}.description: Stores WebRTC signaling information for calls.

/calls/{callId}/candidates/{candidateId}.description: Stores ICE candidates for a specific call.
